Recipe.Title: Mini Frittatas with Hillshire Farm® Smoked Sausage and Potato
Recipe.Description: Bake these fun mini frittatas in a muffin tin for a satisfying on-the-go snack filled with smoked sausage, hash browns, and bell pepper.
Recipe.Author: By Hillshire Farm(R) Brand

Recipe.Title: Ground Beef Enchiladas
Recipe.Description: These are beef filled tortilla shells baked in a creamy chicken soup and cheese sauce. My husband absolutely loves these. I served them to guests once with Mexican rice, and they went home with the recipe! Enjoy!
Recipe.Author: By Vanessa Robbins

Recipe.Title: Biscuits and Gravy Casserole
Recipe.Description: Biscuits, eggs, gravy, sausage, and Cheddar cheese are baked together using this biscuits and gravy casserole recipe for the ultimate comfort food.
Recipe.Author: By Angela

Recipe.Title: Low-Carb Salisbury Steak
Recipe.Description: Homemade mushroom gravy takes the flavor of simple hamburger steaks to the next level. It's still quick enough to cook for a weeknight dinner.
Recipe.Author: By Chef DJ

Recipe.Title: Easy Garlic-Lemon Scallops
Recipe.Description: Scallops sauteed in butter and garlic will melt in your mouth. Lemon juice gives it a nice kick.
Recipe.Author: By Button

Recipe.Title: Brown Sugar Banana Bread
Recipe.Description: Brown sugar and cinnamon add depth to this moist, sweet banana bread.
Recipe.Author: By The D Family

Recipe.Title: Cousin David's Slow Cooker Brisket
Recipe.Description: This is a family recipe passed along by my late cousin David. It is so simple...just four ingredients thrown in the slow cooker! Not only is it great to come home to a hot delicious meal...your home will smell wonderful too! It is great with the extra gravy spooned over egg noodles or mashed potatoes.
Recipe.Author: By DRUMNWRITE

Recipe.Title: Breakfast Pies
Recipe.Description: A biscuit crust filled with sausage, eggs, and cheese. These individual breakfast pies can be made ahead of time, and microwaved as needed.
Recipe.Author: By CRANEJWR

Recipe.Title: California Melt
Recipe.Description: This fresh and easy open-face melt is made with avocado, mushrooms, almonds, and tomato. Ready in minutes!
Recipe.Author: By ORNERY

Recipe.Title: Beef and Vegetable Stew
Recipe.Description: Button mushrooms and peas are the final ingredients added to this low-fat rosemary seasoned stew. Serve as is or over cooked noodles.
Recipe.Author: By Marianne
